name: Gliding Griffin
description:
A baby griffin has fallen into a cave while learning to fly. Can you help it master flight while avoiding the many dangers of the deep dark cave.

Gliding Griffin is a 2D pixel art platformer featuring gliding mechanics. It was made over a weekend for TOJAM 2021: Feels Like A Rerun.

Gamepad supported.

WASD or Arrows for movement. 

Spacebar to glide.
